Title: Relates to driving while ability impaired by fatigue
Summary: Creates the offense of driving while drowsy, a class A misdemeanor; includes driving while drowsy under the offense of vehicular assault in the second degree; creates the crime of vehicular homicide caused by driving while ability impaired by fatigue, a class E felony, subject to an indeterminate term of imprisonment of up to three years and license revocation.
LawCode: Add ยง1212-a, V & T L; amd ยง120.03, add ยง125.23, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the penal law, in relation to driving while drowsy
